snippet: Osanna Visconti's new collection of cast-bronze furniture takes its inspiration from forms found in nature, much like the coveted jewelry she creates with the help of her daughter, Madina.
abstract: Osanna Visconti di Modrone, Milan-based designer best known for her jewelry, launches collection of cast-bronze furniture inspired by forms found in nature.
lead_paragraph: Osanna Visconti's new collection of cast-bronze furniture takes its inspiration from forms found in nature, much like the coveted jewelry she creates with the help of her daughter, Madina.
